function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of consideration for contagious disease transmission in green spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread in public green spaces","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to mitigate disease transmission, such as proper sanitation and social distancing guidelines","Technologies":"Sanitation stations, crowd monitoring technology","People":"Visitors to public green spaces","Owner":"Local health authorities and park management"},{"Description":"Inadequate wildlife management leading to disease transmission","Impact":"Potential for wildlife-borne diseases to spread in the green spaces","Mitigation":"Implementing wildlife management strategies to minimize disease transmission, such as habitat management and monitoring","Technologies":"Advanced wildlife tracking and monitoring technology","People":"Visitors to public green spaces, wildlife in the area","Owner":"Park management and conservation organizations"},{"Description":"Impact of urban matrix on disease transmission","Impact":"Influence of urban land use on disease transmission in green spaces","Mitigation":"Implementing urban planning strategies that minimize disease transmission, such as zoning regulations and green space design considerations","Technologies":"Geospatial mapping, urban planning software","People":"Residents near green spaces, visitors to green spaces","Owner":"Urban planning authorities, park management"}]}
